gloss: a card game similar to ecarte; each player is dealt 5 cards and the player making trump must take 3 tricks to win a hand / a small board full of holes; each hole contains a slip of paper with symbols printed on it; a gambler pays a small sum for the privilege of pushing out a slip in the hope of obtaining one that entitles him to a prize / a small cube with 1 to 6 spots on the six faces; used in gambling to generate random numbers / a team that plays football / a toy consisting of a spool that is reeled up and down on a string by motions of the hand / away from the defending teams' end of the playing field / decide (a contest or competition) by a runoff / of or relating to the palm of the hand or to the area at the base of the thumb / on the home team's field / one of a set of small pieces of stiff paper marked in various ways and used for playing games or for telling fortunes / the finger farthest from the thumb / vote cumulatively and distribute the votes according to some principle
activity by children that is guided more by imagination than by fixed rules

a light, plastic disk about 10 inches in diameter; propelled with a flip of the wrist for recreation or competition / a small rubber ball used in playing the game of handball / a wooden ball (with flattened sides so that it rolls on a curved course) used in the game of lawn bowling
a point conceded or yielded / a score in American football; being in possession of the ball across the opponents' goal line / achieve a point or goal

a doll with a hollow head of a person or animal and a cloth body; intended to fit over the hand and be manipulated with the fingers / plaything consisting of a toy figure with movable joints that can be made to dance by pulling strings / plaything consisting of a toy pistol that squirts water

a game in which one child chases the others; the one who is caught becomes the next chaser / a game played in a walled court or against a single wall by two or four players who strike a rubber ball with their hands / solitaire with two players using separate packs
